pages.text: $(mod)Building Wands$() adds 4 tiers of $(item)Wand$(), which greatly help with placing blocks for building.$(br2)It has several placement modes, which can be toggled with the Mode key ($(info)$(k:wands.wand_mode)$() by default). The modes, in order, are:

pages.title: Directional Mode
pages.text: Place blocks in a direction from the block aimed at without having to move.$(br2)Can be placed in 8 directions: the 4 cardinals, the 4 diagonals, and the face opposite.

pages.title: Row/Column Mode
pages.text: Places either a row or column of the block.$(br2)Toggle which using the Orientation key ($(info)$(k:wands.wand_orientation)$() by default).

pages.title: Fill Mode
pages.text: Right-click two opposite corners of a cuboid, and it fills that volume.

pages.title: Area Mode
pages.text: Places on an entire connected surface of blocks.

pages.title: Line Mode
pages.text: Right-click two opposite corners of a line, and it places along that length.

pages.title: Circle Mode
pages.text: Right-click where the center is, then right-click again somewhere else to set the radius.$(br2)Places either along the circumference or fills the entire circle, depending on how the wand is configured ($(k:wands.wand_fill_circle) to toggle).

pages.title: Rectangle Mode
pages.text: Right-click two opposite corners of a cuboid, and places along 2 sides, the top, and the bottom.

pages.title: Copy/Paste Modes
pages.text: In copy mode, right-click two opposite corners of a cuboid to copy the contents.$(br2)In paste mode, right-click to place what is copied.
